page.title: 09 Mrs Roberts Of Winsford
page.content: I get up in the morning and make my-self a cup of coffee.After dressing I go to work at{High Street School, where my two assistants are waiting for me at the kitchen door.I prepare the food for the childrens' lunch. Later we washed up and cleaned the kitchen, plan tomorrows menu. When I return home I do the washing and the ironing and sometimes bake. In the evening I prepare a meal and then I sit down and do some knitting. Some nights I go dancing.I end my evening watching the News.Then I go to bed but before I go to sleep I read a few pages of a book then I turn out the light and go to sleep.
